rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {S6001}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MTH3241}

unitName: The theory of martingales in discrete time
description: Doob's convergence theorem. Optional sampling theorem. Discrete Stochastic integral. Martingale inequalities such as Doob and Burkholder-Davis-Gundy inequalities. Bucy-Kalman filter. Applications to finance. Option pricing - discrete Black-Scholes formula. Control theory.
